archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.3.5a: a) subject to authentication (e.g. by using passwords/passphrases, token, biometric or RFID badge) to reduce the likelihood of confidential documents being left uncollected on the device
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
